Header with Navigation.Layout: Fixed top bar with a logo on the left and navigation links on the right.
Header with Navigation.Design: Clean and organized with a focus on usability and accessibility.

Key Elements.Logo: Prominently displayed on the left, visually balancing the navigation links.
Key Elements.Navigation Links: Evenly spaced links for easy access to different sections of the site, with hover and active states.
Key Elements.Responsive: Adapts to different screen sizes with a mobile-friendly menu button appearing on smaller screens.
Key Elements.Call-to-Action Button: Optional button for important actions like sign-up or contact.

Header with Navigation.Use Cases: Suitable for any website needing a clear and accessible navigation structure, including corporate sites, blogs, and e-commerce platforms.
